isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Diesel Engine Diagnostic Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Hard Start and No Start Diagnostics

svcsection.title: Hard Start and No Start Diagnostics

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure the transmission is in neutral, parking brake is set, and wheels are blocked before doing diagnostic or service procedures on engine or vehicle.

geninfo.para: The Diagnostic Form (Hard Start and No Start side) directs technicians to systematically troubleshoot a hard start or no start condition and avoid unnecessary repairs.

This section shows detailed instructions of the tests on the form. The manual should be used with the form and referenced for supplemental test information. Use the form as a worksheet to record all test results.
Do all tests in sequence, unless otherwise stated. Doing a test out of sequence can cause incorrect results. If a problem was found and corrected, it is not necessary to complete the remaining tests.
See appendices for Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs) and engine specifications.
